snippet: “The Emperor of All Maladies: A Biography of Cancer,” a Pulitzer Prize-winning book, will be the basis for a six-hour documentary series for public television, to be overseen by Ken Burns.
abstract: “The Emperor of All Maladies: A Biography of Cancer,” a Pulitzer Prize-winning book, will be the basis for a six-hour documentary series for public television, to be overseen by Ken Burns.

headline.main: Ken Burns to Oversee 'Emperor of All Maladies' Project for Public Television
headline.print_headline: Ken Burns to Oversee ‘Emperor of All Maladies’
